title: can you delete my account?
body: can you delete my account? because i would like to make new account.

replies.body:
There's nothing wrong with leaving your account as it is or even using it instead of creating a new one. If you really want to move forward with the deletion however;

Communicate with Riot’s [Account Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


* Under the secondary select **Account.**


* For the tertiary category select **Management.**

* Title the request "Requesting Account Deletion" 


http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/de/Kayle_SilverSkin_Ch.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111029070156

Any account-specific requests need to be made [through a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our account specialists. This is because account-specific requests often deal with sensitive information that shouldn't be publicly posted on the boards.

Let me know if you have any questions.
